assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: The authors declare that they have no conflict of interest.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: No ethics approval was necessary for our study since we were not working with sensitive or patient-related data. All project activities were carried out in compliance with ethical principles as set out, for instance, in the European Code of Conduct for Research Integrity. Participants of the focus groups signed an informed consent form for being included in the study and a confirmed consent form for publication as part of the study consent form.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: Informed consent was obtained from all individual participants included in the study.
